overview: Six young volunteers from different backgrounds travel to Israel to spend a summer working on a kibbutz, a communal farm where they can find adventure, hide from their pasts or search for themselves.  But when American pre-med student Mike falls for tough kibbutz woman Gila he must make the most difficult choice of his life.  In a land of clashing cultures, remarkable possibilities and shocking dangers, can real love survive the most surprising challenge of them all?
title: Not Quite Paradise
